changeSet.author: SivaKrishna
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for OPD Progress Note

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ( "162869") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where `name` = 'CEIL' and retired =0 );

changeSet.sql: call CREATE_REFERENCE_MAPPING_CEIL('CM, Start date of complication', '162869');

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Acute Kidney Injury","Anemia due to acute blood loss","Antibiotic Adverse Reaction","Bedsores or pressure ulcer", "Cardiac Arrhythmia","Cellulitis","Chest Infection","Compartment Syndrome","Death","Deep Venous Thrombosis", "Delayed union","Early bone malalignment","Flap Necrosis","Heart Failure","Hematoma or bleeding from surgical site", "Hospital Acquired Infection","Iatrogenic Fracture","Implant Failure","Implant failure and re-fracture of bone", "Limb Ischemia","Nerve Injury","Osteomyelitis, post-operative","Pin loosening","Pin track infection in the project", "Re-fracture of bone","Septic Shock","Seroma without infection","Skin Graft Failure","Stress Ulcer", "Stress Ulcer with bleeding","Stroke","Surgical Site Infection","Tissue Expander Infection", "Venous thromboembolic disease","Wound Dehiscence","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Patient complication");

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No transfusion","Transfusion required") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Anemia due to acute blood loss, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Anemia due to acute blood loss, description

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Severe nausea and vomiting", "Neutropenia", "Thrombocytopenia", "Rash", "Febrile reaction", "Acute kidney Injury", "Anaphylaxis", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Antibiotic adverse reaction, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Antibiotic adverse reaction, description

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Atrial fibrillation","SVT", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Cardiac arrhythmia, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Cardiac arrhythmia, description

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Superficial", "Deep", "Full-thickness") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Flap necrosis, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Flap necrosis, description

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Stage 1", "Stage 2", "Stage 3", "Stage 4") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Bedsores or pressure ulcer, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Bedsores or pressure ulcer, description

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( "Grade I - No treatment", "Grade II - Requiring drug treatment", "Grade IIIa - Interventions with local anaesthesia", "Grade IIIb - Interventions under general anaesthesia", "Grade IVa - Single-organ dysfunction", "Grade IVb - Multi-organ dysfunction", "Grade V - Death of patient" ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Grade of complication");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Grade of complication
